messages.title: A strong, experienced voice for Arfon
messages.content: It has been an honor to represent the Caernarfon constituency in Parliament since 2001. I'm also very familiar with Bangor and district, having taught at the University for 10 years and been employed before that as a social worker in Gwynedd.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Securing an investment compensation scheme for quarrymen.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Stop the hike in fuel tax

leaflet.personalStatement: Dear Elector, ... Think different, think Plaid. ... I keep to the highest standards of public service, while many MPs were too busy lining their pockets from the public purse.

politicalExperience.achievements: Representing the Caernarfon constituency in parliament, teaching at the University for 10 years, employed as a social worker in Gwynedd.

endorsements.endorsement: Hywel Williams is the principled and steadfast MP for Arfon.

images.caption: Hywel Williams with supporters and constituents.
